snippet: The two networks already have the rights for the World Cup in 2018 and 2022. FIFA also extended its deal to 2026 in Canada with CTV and TSN.
abstract: Fox and Telemundo networks extend contract with FIFA to broadcast World Cup soccer games through 2026.
lead_paragraph: The two networks already have the rights for the World Cup in 2018 and 2022. FIFA also extended its deal to 2026 in Canada with CTV and TSN.

headline.main: Fox and Telemundo to Show World Cup Through 2026 as FIFA Extends Contracts
headline.print_headline: Fox and Telemundo to Show World Cup Through 2026 as FIFA Extends Contracts
